purpleculture_pinyin:
wèn
Wen River in northwest Sichuan (same as 汶川 ); classical name of river in Shandong, used to refer to Qi 齐国
Река Вэнь на северо-западе Сычуани (такая же, как 汶川); классическое название реки в Шаньдуне, используемое для обозначения Ци 齐国
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 文 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
茂汶县 [ mào wèn xiàn ]: Maowen county in Sichuan, home of the Qiang people 羌族
东帝汶 [ dōng dì wèn ]: East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)
汶上 [ wèn shàng ]: Wenshang County in Jining 济宁
汶上县 [ wèn shàng xiàn ]: Wenshang County in Jining 济宁 , Shandong
汶川 [ wèn chuān ]: Wenchuan county (Tibetan: wun khron rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿坝藏族羌族自治州 , northwest Sichuan

Ru_trainchinese: wèn: (графема) Вэнь (река на северо-западе пров. Сычуань); Вэнь (древнее название реки в пров. Шаньдун, использовалось для указания на царство Ци)

汶字的基本解释

汶
wèn
〔汶水〕水名，在中国山东省。亦称“大汶河”。

汶
mén
　ㄇㄣˊ
〔汶汶〕心中昏暗不明，如“人又谁能以身之察察，受物之汶汶者乎？”

汶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wèn］
［《廣韻》亡運切，去問，微。］
(1)水名。即今大汶河。源出山东省莱芜市北，西南流经古嬴县南，古称嬴汶，又西南会牟汶、北汶、石汶、柴汶至今东平县戴村坝。自此以下，古汶水西流经东平县南，至梁山东南入济水。
(2)水名。今汶河。源出山东省临胊县南，东北流，至安丘县东北入潍河。
(3)水名。桑泉水的别称。今东汶河上源。源出山东省蒙阴县西，东南流经县南，至沂南县南入沂河。
[②]［mén］
［《集韻》謨奔切，平魂，明。］
(1)见“汶2汶”。
(2)蒙蔽。
[③]［mín］
［《廣韻》武巾切，平真，明。］
［《集韻》眉貧切，平真，明。］
同“岷1”。
(1)山名。
(2)水名。岷江。

汶字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　汶； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页608第08
〔古文〕渂【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?文運切，音問。水名。【書·禹貢】浮于汶，達于濟。又濟東北會于汶。【前漢·地理志】泰山郡萊蕪縣原山汶水出，西南入泲。【水經】汶水，出泰山萊蕪縣原山西南，過壽張縣，至安民亭入于濟。【註】汶出牟縣故城西南阜下，俗謂之胡盧堆。牟縣，古牟國，故俗謂是水爲牟汶。汶水又右合北汶水，水出太山天門下谷東流，西南逕汶陽縣，又西南逕桃鄕縣，自桃鄕四分，當其派別之處，謂之四汶口。左二水雙流至無鹽郈鄕平陸故城，合爲茂都澱。次一汶至壽張故城東，遂爲澤渚。右一汶逕壽張縣西南，注長直溝，西流入泲。【淮南子·地形訓】汶出弗其。【高誘註】弗其，山名，在朱虛縣東。◎按誘說乃東汶，非經所謂入濟者也。　又【前漢·地理志】琅邪郡朱虛縣東泰山，汶水所出，東至安丘入維。【說文】維作濰。【水經】汶水出朱虛縣泰山。【酈道元注】伏琛晏謨?言，水出縣東西峿山，山在小泰山東。地理風俗記曰：朱虛縣東四十里有峿城，亭故縣也。汶水逕峿城北，又北過淳於縣西。濰水過縣東，

Basic explanation of words
Wen
wèn
〔文水〕The name of the water is in Shandong Province, China. Also known as "Dawen River".
Wen
mén
ㄇ ㄣˊ
[Wen Wen] Her heart is dim and unclear, such as "Who can observe with the body, and the Wenwen who receives things?"
Wen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wèn］
["Guang Yun" cuts to death, go ask, Wei. ]
(1) Water name. Now Dawen River. It originated in the north of Laiwu City, Shandong Province, and flows through the south of Guying County in the southwest. It was called Yingwen in ancient times, and Muwen, Beiwen, Shiwen, Chaiwen, and Daicunba of Dongping County are in the southwest. Since then, the Guwen River flows westward through Dongping County to the south and enters Jishui River to the southeast of Liangshan Mountain.
(2) Water name. Today Wenhe. It originates from the south of Linpeng County, Shandong Province, flows to the northeast, and flows into the Weihe River to the northeast of Anqiu County.
(3) Water name. Another name for Sangquan Water. Now the source of the East Wen River. It originates in the west of Mengyin County, Shandong Province, flows through the south of the county in the southeast, and enters the Yi River in the south of Yinan County.
[②]［mén］
["Ji Yun" Mo Benqie, Ping Hun, Ming. ]
(1) See "Wen 2 Wen".
(2) Blinded.
[③] [mín]
["Guangyun" Wujin cut, plain and clear. ]
["Jiyun" brows are poor and cut, plain and clear. ]
Same as "Min 1".
(1) The name of the mountain.
(2) Water name. Minjiang.
Wen

〔古文〕渂【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】? The text is cut, the sound is asked. Water name. 【Book·Yugong】Floating in Wen and reaching to Ji. And the northeast will be in Wen. [Pre-Han·Geography] Laiwu County, Taishan County, the original mountain and Wenshui flow out, and the southwest enters Wei. [Water Classic] Wenshui, going out of Taishan Mountain to the southwest of Laiwu County, passing through Shouzhang County, to Anmin Pavilion and entering Yuji. [Note] Fuxia, southwest of the ancient city of Mou County, Wenchu, is commonly known as Hu Ludui. Mou County, the ancient country of Mou, so it is said that water is Mouwen. Wenshui joins North Wenshui on the right, and the water flows eastward from the lower valley of Tianmen in Taishan, Wenyang County in the southwest and Taoyang County in the southwest. It is four points from Taoyuan. When it is a faction, it is called Siwenkou. From the left, the two rivers flow to the ancient city of Pinglu without salt, and together it becomes Maodudian. From the second Wen to the east of Shouzhang’s ancient city, it was Zezhu. On the right, in the southwest of Shouzhang County, Wenjing, the Changzhi ditch is injected, and the river flows into the west. [Huainanzi·Training of Terrain] Wen comes from Fuqi. [Gaoyou Note] Fuqi, the name of the mountain, is in the east of Zhuxu County. ◎According to the temptation, it is East-Leste, not the so-called financial aid.　[Pre-Han·Geography] Dongtai Mountain, Zhuxu County, Langya County, exited from Wenshui, east to Anqiu and entered Wei. [Speaking text] Wei Zuo Wei. [Water Classic] Wenshui left Mount Tai in Zhuxu County. [Li Daoyuan's Note] Fu Chen and Yan Mo? said that the water is out of the county's Dongxiyu Mountain, and the mountain is in Xiaotaishan Mountain. The geography and customs record says: East Forty Mile in Zhuxu County, there is Yucheng and Tinggu County. Wenshui Jingyu is north of the city, and north of Chunyu County. Weishui crosses the east of the county,
Wen
Source glyph
Wen
Name meaning
: Refers to the words used for the names of water and mountains.
汶
形声字。水(氵)表意,篆书形体像河流,表示汶河;文(wen)表声,文有花纹义,花纹较密集,表示汶河支流众多。
本义是汶水,也叫大汶河。
汶河,在山东省,也叫大汶河。
wèn
~河 ~水

プ
Вэнь
Пиктофонетические символы.
Вода (氵) выражает значение, шрифт печати подобен реке, что означает реку Венхэ; Вен (wen) выражает звук, надпись имеет значение узора, а узоры более плотные, что означает, что есть много притоков реки Вэньхэ.
Первоначальное значение - Веншуй, также называемое Давэнхэ.
Вэньхэ в провинции Шаньдун также называют Давэньхэ.
~ река ~ вода
